mapper.select: select m.*, (select count(*) from posting p where m.m_no=p.m_no)posCount, (select count(*) from fan f where f.me_no=m.m_no)fanCount, (select count(*) from fan f where f.you_no=m.m_no)fwCount from member m where m_no=#{mno}
select p.*, (select count(*) from p_reply r where r.p_no=p.p_no)replyCount from posting p where m_no=#{mno} order by p.enroll_date desc
select p.*, (select count(*) from p_reply r where r.p_no=p.p_no)replyCount from posting p left join p_like l on(l.p_no=p.p_no) where l.m_no=#{mno} order by p.enroll_date desc

select m.*, (select count(*) from posting p where m.m_no=p.m_no)posCount, (select count(*) from p_like l where m.m_no=l.m_no)likeCount, (select count(*) from p_reply r left join posting p on(p.p_no=r.p_no) where p.p_no=r.p_no and r.m_no=m.m_no)replyCount, (select count(*) from fan where me_no=f.you_no and you_no=#{loginMno})fanCheck from member m left join fan f on(m.m_no=f.you_no) where f.me_no=#{mno} order by f.enroll_date desc

select m.*, (select count(*) from posting p where m.m_no=p.m_no)posCount, (select count(*) from p_like l where m.m_no=l.m_no)likeCount, (select count(*) from p_reply r left join posting p on(p.p_no=r.p_no) where p.p_no=r.p_no and r.m_no=m.m_no)replyCount, (select count(*) from fan where me_no=f.me_no and you_no=#{loginMno})fanCheck from member m left join fan f on(m.m_no=f.me_no) where f.you_no=#{mno} order by f.enroll_date desc
select * from ad where m_no=#{mno} order by enroll_date desc
select count(*) from alarm where status=1

select a.*, (select count(*) from alarm where status=1 and m_no=#{mno})alarmCount, (select nickName from member where m_no=a.b_m_no)nickName, (select rename_Img from member where m_no=a.b_m_no)renameImg from alarm a where status=1 and m_no=#{mno} order by a.enroll_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from fan where me_no=#{meNo} and you_no=#{youNo}
